'''Iolfr''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Iolfr is a dwarven tailor providing his services to the wealthy of [Neketaka](/neketaka/). He's particularly sensitive on the point of being a dwarf, as he's been treated to a lifetime of prejudice.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Clothing. Includes the unique [Mantle of the Seven Bolts](/mantleOfTheSevenBolts/), [Burglar's Gloves](/burglarsGloves/), [Ngati's Girdle](/ngatisGirdle/), and [Three Trolls Stitched](/threeTrollsStitched/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* With [Athletics](/athletics/) 3 you can make a point about him making assumptions about you making assumptions.
}}
